post_message: A sad day for the hundreds and thousands of animals lovers who were following the story of Pedals the bear.  The bear that became famous for roaming around New Jersey on his hind legs like a human has been killed during New Jersey hunt.  A hunter shot the bear with a bow and arrow.  The hunter has reportedly been stalking Pedals for three years.
